name: Cellulose, regenerated polymer with epichlorohydrin, carboxymethyl 2-hydroxypropyl ether
FoodContactSubstance: Cellulose, regenerated polymer with epichlorohydrin, carboxymethyl 2-hydroxypropyl ether (CAS Reg. No. 343844-23-5). The FCS is also referred to as carboxymethyl (CM) ion exchange cellulose resin.
